description: A person with red hair enters and looks around a luxurious restaurant with elegant decor. The person is wearing a black and white checkered shirt. Text on the screen mentions a real direct message from the person.
A man in a plaid shirt walks through an elegant hallway with ornate white walls and potted white orchids. He has a contemplative expression.

The scene shows an elegant dining room with high ceilings, ornate columns, and guests seated at tables with white linens. Servers are attending to the guests, and there is a grand piano in the background.
The chandelier is ornate with multiple tiers of crystals, providing a warm, elegant glow to the room with high ceilings and detailed moldings.
